snippet: The Israeli prime minister, speaking in Washington, appealed to Democrats still troubled by the public feud over the Iran nuclear deal.
abstract: Israeli Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu, speaking to Center for American Progress, says support for Israel in United States must be bipartisan
lead_paragraph: The Israeli prime minister, speaking in Washington, appealed to Democrats still troubled by the public feud over the Iran nuclear deal.

headline.main: Support for Israel Must Be Bipartisan, Netanyahu Tells U.S. Audience
headline.print_headline: Support for Israel Must Be Bipartisan, Netanyahu Tells U.S. Audience
